title: how long until ww fad dies out?
body:
i've been playing ww since before he was cool, and now he got this rework and now hes not only the kewl wolf man i love, he is also fun to play and can do something other than ult.
how long until i can play him without infinite picks and bans of him
how long did it take ryze?

replies.body:
Just wait for his "nerfs" that everyone is saying he needs for his damage xD then he won't be banned as much. Also people ban him just because hes new and they don't want a new champ in their ranked matches until people learn the champ.

So prolly a week or so.
Give it a week, new champs fizzle out fast. I doubt an update hype will last longer than Camille hype.
